deck: Brother of Richard Rider aka Nova. He was recently selected to become a member of the Nova Corps as well. He get jealous of his brothers power and disobeys him.
description:
Origin

Robbie Rider is the younger brother of Richard Rider, also known as the cosmic hero Nova, and the son of Charles and Gloria Rider. Robbie is a scientific genius who achieved independent wealth through software development. He helped out his brother more then once, although he never knew his brother was actually the superhero Nova.

Mayor Story Arcs

Secret Invasion

When the Skrull Invasion of Earth began, Robbie Rider was working at the P.E.G.A.S.U.S. Project, an American facility full of alien weapons and technology. Due to the importance and potential threat of this facility, it became a primary Skrull target. When Nova returned to Earth after learning of the invasion, he found out from his parents that his brother was potentially in danger. He went to the P.E.G.A.S.U.S. Project to make sure Robbie was okay. When he arrived, he found out that the facility had already been attacked once. The security forces there, led by Darkhawk, believed Nova to be a Skrull, but it was Robbie who vouched for him and proved the Nova was who he said he was.

Robbie helped revive Worldmind, the Nova Corps super computer, who helped turn the tide of the battle. After the surprising return of the Nova Corps and the consequent defeat of the Skrulls, Robbie felt that he was still under the shadow of his big brother. But everything changed the moment that Worldmind selected him as a new member of the Nova Corps. Nova was against Worldmind's decision to rebuild the Corps so quickly and Robbie thought it was because Nova was jealous that he wasn't the only brother with super powers anymore.

War of Kings and Thanos Imperative

Robbie remained with the newly established Nova Corps and fought in the war known as the War of Kings, between the Shi'ar Empire let by the earth mutant Vulcan and the Kree Empire led by the Inhumans. When the Nova Corps was scattered around the battlefield, and Richard Rider was nowhere to be found, Robbie took on one of the biggest threads all by himself and even managed to defeat him. This greatly increased his confidence. Robbie remains a Nova Centurion til this day, even after the events of the Thanos Imperative, in which Robbie's brother seemingly sacrificed himself.

Alternate Reality

In Earth-9442 Robert Rider received the Nova Force instead of Rich because of his higher intellect and became the hero known as Nova 0:0. He also mange to improve the use of his powers, as he could jump to different realities by gathering energy.

deck: member of the V-Battalion
description: Darren Mitchell is the grandson of the Kid Commando called the Human top II named David Mitchell. David and Gwenny Lou were victims of the Nazi villain Agent Axis who was going to experiment on them using a transfusion from the Human Torch I. Darren used his scientific knowledge and his father's research to create his powers. He tends to be the V-battalion's science officer, and he has sacrificed a lot growing up in a isolated environment. He feels that he is ready for the responsibilities against world conflict. However, with the death of Ameiko, Darren feels that maybe there is no reason he should stay with the V-battalion. However, following Ameiko's funeral, Darren discovered that his friend died doing what she believed in, and he also believed in her cause. He has returned to the V-battalion more dedicated then ever.

deck: Glitterbug is a member of Morgan's crew in Harlem and they would come into conflict with the fanatical National Force when they enter their turf.
description:
Glitterbug is a member of Morgan's crew in Harlem and they would come into conflict with a fanatical group called the National Force led by the Grand Director. Captain America is caught in the middle and tries to prevent more bloodshed before it escalates any further. Words begin to exchange between the groups and Captain America grabs Glitterbug when he pulls out a pistol. A brainwashed Sharon Carter is leading the National Force into Harlem and orders her men to attack in the name of the Grand Director. Captain America throws Glitterbug into a National Force member and starts fighting with both parties. Glitterbug and the rest of Morgan's crew split when the National Guard arrive. 

Creation

Glitterbug was created by Roger McKenzie, Sal Buscema and Don Perlin in 1979 and first appeared in Captain America # 233.

Abilities

Glitterbug is a gangster that carries a pistol with him.
name: Glitterbug

deck: Strangler is a member of Shatterforce and would come into conflict with Nova.
description:
Creation

Strangler was created by Chris Marrinan in 1994 and first appeared in Nova # 8.    

Powers & Abilities

Strangler wears an armored suit that grants him enhanced strength, durability and resistance to injury. He can also emit an electrical discharge from his gauntlets when he touches or grasps an opponent.
name: Strangler

deck: Sindella is the deceased wife of Zatara and mother of Zatanna.
description:
Origin

Sindella is the mother of Zatanna and wife of Zatara.

Although thought dead through childbirth, Sindella had actually fled the newborn Zatanna after the evil Allura had places a curse on her and Zatara, in which they would both die should they ever see each other again.

Sindella left and returned to her own people, a group of Homo Magi located in a hidden city in Northern Turkey. The inhabitants turned on her however, and began absorbing her magical power.Fearing they would soon do the same to Zatanna, she contacted her telepathically.

Zatanna, Zatara and the Justice League soon came to Sindella's aid and where attacked by the inhabitants of the city. Eventually, Sindella sacrificed herself in order to save her family.
